packages.description: General-purpose functions leveraged in downstream WesMC Apps & Devices

packages.name: Push Button Switch Group (PBSG) Bundle
packages.description: Create virtual keypads with mutually-exclusive buttons and corresponding virtual switches.
packages.descriptive:
Device Behavior
  • Create a Virtual Keypad with 1..N named buttons
  • Each button has a synchronized child Virtual Switch with Toggle (VSWT)
  • Only one Button/VSWT is active/on() at any time
  • Optionally: Select a Default Button/VSWT (activates if no peers are active)
Keypad Methods
  • configPbsg(String jsonPrefs) // Set|Adjust Preferences programmatically
  • activate(String button)
  • deactivate(String button)
  • push(Integer buttonNumber) // Toggle Button/VSWT
Child Device Methods
  • on() // activates corresponding button
  • off() // deactivates corresponding button
  • push() // toggles corresponding button
Special Features
  • Tracks the state of PBSG instances in a ConcurrentHashMap.
  • Each PBSG uses a SynchronousQueue to ensure async FIFO execution.
